message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you take 10.  We can work out a better deal later if you're willing to negotiate.

I'm not willing to accept 40. I think 80 is a fairer split, considering the value of the money is decreasing.

Okay, Bob, we're down to the wire. I'm taking a risk here, but let's split it 30/70.  It's the best chance we have to get anything at all.
